verses.verse: The burden <S%H4853><s%> of Moab: <S%H4124><s%> for in a night, <S%H3915><s%> Ar <S%H6144><s%> of Moab <S%H4124><s%> is laid waste, <S%H7703><s%> and brought to nothing; <S%H1820><s%> for in a night <S%H3915><s%> Kir <S%H7024><s%> of Moab <S%H4124><s%> is laid waste, <S%H7703><s%> and brought to nothing. <S%H1820><s%>

They have gone up <S%H5927><s%> to Bayith, <S%H1006><s%> and to Dibon, <S%H1769><s%> to the high places, <S%H1116><s%> to weep. <S%H1065><s%> Moab <S%H4124><s%> wails <S%H3213><s%> over Nebo <S%H5015><s%> and over Medeba. <S%H4311><s%> Baldness <S%H7144><s%> is on all of their heads. <S%H7218><s%> Every beard <S%H2206><s%> is cut off. <S%H1438><s%>

In their streets, <S%H2351><s%> they clothe <S%H2296><s%> themselves in sackcloth. <S%H8242><s%> In their streets <S%H7339><s%> and on their housetops, <S%H1406><s%> everyone wails, <S%H3213><s%> weeping <S%H1065><s%> abundantly. <S%H3381><s%>

Heshbon <S%H2809><s%> cries <S%H2199><s%> out with Elealeh. <S%H500><s%> Their voice <S%H6963><s%> is heard <S%H8085><s%> even to Jahaz. <S%H3096><s%> Therefore the armed men <S%H2502><s%> of Moab <S%H4124><s%> cry aloud. <S%H7321><s%> Their souls <S%H5315><s%> tremble within them. <S%H3415><s%>

My heart <S%H3820><s%> cries out <S%H2199><s%> for Moab! <S%H4124><s%> Her nobles <S%H1280><s%> flee to Zoar, <S%H6820><s%> to Eglath <S%H5697><s%> Shelishiyah; <S%H7992><s%> for they go up <S%H4608><s%> by the ascent <S%H5927><s%> of Luhith <S%H3872><s%> with weeping; <S%H1065><s%> for in the way <S%H1870><s%> of Horonaim, <S%H2773><s%> they raise up <S%H5927><s%> a cry <S%H2201><s%> of destruction. <S%H7667><s%>

For the waters <S%H4325><s%> of Nimrim <S%H5249><s%> will be desolate; <S%H4923><s%> for the grass <S%H1877><s%> has withered away, <S%H3001><s%> the tender grass <S%H1877><s%> fails, <S%H3615><s%> there is no green thing. <S%H3418><s%>

Therefore they will carry <S%H6213><s%> away the abundance <S%H3502><s%> they have gotten, <S%H6213><s%> and that which they have stored up, <S%H6486><s%> over the brook <S%H5158><s%> of the willows. <S%H6155><s%>

For the cry <S%H2201><s%> has gone around <S%H5362><s%> the borders <S%H1366><s%> of Moab; <S%H4124><s%> its wailing <S%H3215><s%> to Eglaim, <S%H97><s%> and its wailing <S%H3215><s%> to Beer Elim. <S%H879><s%>

For the waters <S%H4325><s%> of Dimon <S%H1775><s%> are full <S%H4390><s%> of blood; <S%H1818><s%> for I will bring <S%H7896><s%> yet more <S%H3254><s%> on Dimon, <S%H1775><s%> a lion <S%H738><s%> on those of Moab <S%H4124><s%> who escape, <S%H6413><s%> and on the remnant <S%H7611><s%> of the land. <S%H127><s%>
